Package org.forgerock.openidm.messaging.jms.common

Class JndiJmsContextManager

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.messaging.jms.common.JndiJmsContextManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
JmsContextManager
public class JndiJmsContextManager extends Object implements JmsContextManager
This class provides utility methods to extract JMS objects from JNDI configured objects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    JndiJmsContextManager(JndiConfiguration configuration)
    Given the configuration, this builds a JMS InitialContext.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    jakarta.jms.ConnectionFactory
    getConnectionFactory()
    Returns the JMS connection factory to use to connect to JMS services.
    jakarta.jms.Destination
    getDestination()
    Returns the JMS Destination to use for JMS publish/subscribe functionality.

  • Constructor Details

    • JndiJmsContextManager

      public JndiJmsContextManager(JndiConfiguration configuration) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
      Given the configuration, this builds a JMS InitialContext. The classloader of this class will be used as the context classloader Thread.setContextClassLoader(ClassLoader).
      Parameters:
      configuration - The JNDI configuration.
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.InternalServerErrorException - If unable to create the JNDI context
      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException

      Throws:
